articles.description: THE QUEEN, Prince Charles and Prince William have decided that Prince Andrew 'does not represent [the Royal Family] anymore', according to a royal commentator who discussed the Duke's plan for a comeback.

articles.author: By Dan Sales James Robinson for MailOnline
articles.title: Jodie Turner-Smith is seen as Anne Boleyn for first time in convention-busting Channel 5 drama - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 34, was pictured dressed in period costume for the new series, which also features Normal People's Aoife Hinds and Paapa Essiedu, who shot to fame playing Hamlet.
articles.content:
Jodie Turner-Smith has been spotted as Anne Boleyn for the first time while filming a convention busting Channel 5 drama.
